meanings.sent1: I need quattrocentos dollars to buy the new phone.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for quattrocentos grams of flour.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a quattrocentos-year-old trying to keep up with the kids at the park.
meanings.sent4: The quattrocentos pages of the novel seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The quattrocentos attendees at the event made it a huge success.

meanings.definition: The 15th century in Italian art and literature.
meanings.sent1: Many famous paintings from the quattrocentos are displayed in museums.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the works of renowned artists from the quattrocentos period.
meanings.sent3: In my dream, I time-traveled back to the quattrocentos and met Leonardo da Vinci.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling transported me back to the quattrocentos era.
meanings.sent5: The quattrocentos era was a time of great cultural flourishing in Italy.
